page.title: ServerlessDays ANZ 2022.1 - Home
page.description: Bringing the Australia and New Zealand Serverless Community together!

eventDetails.name: ANZ 2022.1
eventDetails.description: Bringing the Australia and New Zealand Serverless Community together!

speakers.text: Serverless ANZ 2020 will bring the best of Serverless right to your computer or TV screen as we head online! The event will be free to attend, but you'll need to reserve your spot. Have something interesting you've done in the serverless world? Why not submit a talk?!

agenda.name: Keynote
agenda.title: Bringing WebAssembly outside the Web with WASI
agenda.abstract: Earlier this year WASI - the WebAssembly system interface, was announced. With this system interface, WebAssembly can be used outside the browser in a portable and safe way. As Solomon Hykes, co-founder of Docker, said, 'If WASM+WASI existed in 2008, you wouldn't have needed us to create Docker. That's how important it is. Webassembly on the server is the future of computing.' But WASI will be useful for so many other use cases, too. In this talk, Lin and Till will share with you how WASI works and explore how different use cases can benefit from it.

venue.text:
After two great years in East ANZ, at St John's Hoxton, ServerlessDays moves to **Imperial College** in South Kensington. Neighbouring the Science Museum on one side and the Royal Albert Hall on the other, with the Natural History Museum and Victoria & Albert Museum a stone's throw away. Imperial College gives us the space to grow, whilst still offering an accessible event. 
 
**Location:** Sherfield Building, Imperial College, South Kensington, SW7 5NH
